org.restsql.core

Interface SqlBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSqlBuilder, MySqlSqlBuilder, PostgreSqlSqlBuilder

    public interface SqlBuilder
    Builds SQL for an operation on a SQL Resource.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SqlBuilder.SqlStruct
      Helper struct for building SQL.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SqlBuilder.SqlStruct buildSelectSql(SqlResourceMetaData metaData, String mainSql, Request request)
      Creates select SQL.
      Map<String,SqlBuilder.SqlStruct> buildWriteSql(SqlResourceMetaData metaData, Request request, boolean doParent)
      Creates update, insert or delete SQL.
